title: Pakistanis
summary: Pakistanis (Urdu: پاكِستانى قوم‎, romanized: Pākistānī Qaum, lit. 'Pakistani Nation') are the nationals and citizens of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan. According to the 2017 Pakistani national census, the population of Pakistan stood at over 213 million people, making it the fifth-most populous country on Earth.[21] The majority of Pakistanis natively speak languages belonging to the Indo-Aryan and Iranian language families.
